events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund because it does not match what I purchased.
The system identified this request as related to a refund based on the customer's description of receiving the incorrect product.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect order delivery.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear about the mistake with your order. Let me help you with processing your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 987654321 along with a clear photo showing the incorrect product delivered instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
I appreciate your quick help with the refund process. Looking forward to receiving the money back soon.
The refund has been logged and initiated from our side. Please allow a few days for the amount to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received the refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, the refund arrived today. Thank you very much for your help and quick response.
Closing this case as the refund was successfully processed and the customer is satisfied with the resolution.
We have sent you a short survey to gather your feedback on your recent support experience.
